briefTitle: Gene Replacement Therapy Clinical Trial for Participants With Spinal Muscular Atrophy Type 1
officialTitle: Phase 3, Open-Label, Single-Arm, Single-Dose Gene Replacement Therapy Clinical Trial for Patients With Spinal Muscular Atrophy Type 1 With One or Two SMN2 Copies Delivering AVXS-101 by Intravenous Infusion
summary: Phase 3 pivotal US trial studying open-label intravenous administration of onasemnogene abeparvovec-xioi in spinal muscular atrophy (SMA) Type 1 participants.

primaryOutcome.measure: Achievement of Independent Sitting for at Least 30 Seconds
